com.tokelon.toktales.android.activity.integration

Interface ISurfaceViewIntegration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IActivityIntegration
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SurfaceViewIntegration

    public interface ISurfaceViewIntegration
extends IActivityIntegration
    An activity integration that will create the main renderer for the engine, by using a given surface view.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.tokelon.toktales.tools.android.activity.integration.IActivityIntegration

        IActivityIntegration.IActivityIntegrationFactory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void integrateRenderView(IRenderView renderView)
      Passes the integration renderer for this activity to the given render view.
      void setRenderSurfaceName(String surfaceName)
      Sets the name that will be used for the surface of this view.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.tokelon.toktales.tools.android.activity.integration.IActivityIntegration

        onActivityCreate, onActivityDestroy, onActivityPause, onActivityResume, onActivityStart, onActivityStop

    • Method Detail

      • setRenderSurfaceName

        void setRenderSurfaceName(String surfaceName)
        Sets the name that will be used for the surface of this view.

        To have an effect this method must be called before the graphics context has been created, so before integrateRenderView(IRenderView) is called.

        Parameters:
        surfaceName -

      • integrateRenderView

        void integrateRenderView(IRenderView renderView)
        Passes the integration renderer for this activity to the given render view.

        The renderer will then create the graphics context.

        Parameters:
        renderView -
